subject: Skiing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Sargent, a financier helped found the Killington ski area in Vermont, a once-little-known peak that grew into one of America’s largest winter sports resorts.
snippet: Mr. Sargent, a financier helped found the Killington ski area in Vermont, a once-little-known peak that grew into one of America’s largest winter sports resorts.
